title: New: Noble Oak – Erase Me
body:
I find myself returning to **Noble Oak’s** music time after time.

He’s one of those producers/songwriters, much like Washed Out, who appears to effortlessly understand how to craft addictive, mellow melodies. Romantic and tinged with a slight sense of anguish, his latest track, _Erase Me_, is a harmonious five and a half minute journey, perfect for tranquil evenings. Check it out below.
